name: BombRace
description:
Controls - W/S Accelerate/Reverse

A/D Left/Right

X Handbrake

Go around the warehouse and collect gas cans, avoid barrels, and keep an eye on your fuel tank!

This is my first game jam submission ever. WOW what a task this was one of the most difficult things I have ever done. I was hoping to do a lot more with this but of course time always comes to an end. It's a little plain but the game generally handles well. All feedback is greatly greatly appreciated.

Cheers,

Spencer
